name: Olive Grove
description: Transport yourself to the Mediterranean with our authentic Greek cuisine. Enjoy fresh salads, grilled meats, and traditional dishes amidst a rustic, olive tree-filled ambiance.

name: Sakura Sushi
description: Immerse yourself in the art of Japanese cuisine at Sakura. From exquisite sushi rolls to delicate sashimi, we offer a taste of Japan in a serene, traditional setting.

name: Bosphorus
description: Experience the rich flavors of Turkey at Bosphorus Bites. Our menu features succulent kebabs, flavorful mezes, and sweet baklava, all served in a vibrant and welcoming atmosphere.

name: Mamma Mia
description: Mamma Mia Trattoria is your passport to Italy. Enjoy homemade pasta, wood-fired pizzas, and tiramisu in a cozy, family-friendly Italian setting.

name: Wok Kitchen
description: Satisfy your craving for Chinese cuisine at Dragon Wok Kitchen. We offer a diverse range of dishes from various regions of China, served in a contemporary, dragon-themed ambiance.

name: Prague Palate
description: Explore the hearty flavors of Czech cuisine at Prague Palate Tavern. From goulash to schnitzel and pilsner beer, you'll get a taste of traditional Czech dishes in a cozy, Old World setting.

name: Flame & Flavor
description: Flame & Flavor Burgers is your go-to spot for mouthwatering burgers. Our flame-grilled patties are paired with a variety of toppings and served in a vibrant, casual atmosphere.

name: Seoul Spice
description: Dive into the vibrant world of South Korean cuisine at Seoul Spice Kitchen. From spicy kimchi to sizzling bulgogi, we offer an array of Korean delights in a contemporary, Seoul-inspired setting.
